column4: heya.. can anyone point me to a doc that explains in what format the wireless-key line in /etc/network/interfaces must be?
specifically, I have a passphrase with spaces in it, and am wondering how I'm supposed to display that.
check out http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=318539 if it isn't answered, you can probably post and get a reply quickly
that thread talks about a wpa-key config line instead of a wireless-key line. are they one and the same?
